education.description: In my third year of pursuing a B.Tech degree in Computer Science and Engineering at my college life, I have developed a deep understanding of various computer science topics, including programming, algorithms, data structures, database management, and web development.

education.institution: Shri Trilok Bharti Public Sr. Sec. School
education.description: It is a place where we not only gain academic knowledge but also learn the values of discipline, teamwork, respect, and responsibility. School is where dreams begin to form — in classrooms, on the playground, and during morning assemblies.

At my 12th class, I pursued studies in the science stream, benefiting from a comprehensive education that equipped me with the necessary skills and knowledge for my academic and professional endeavors ahead.

experience.position: Web Development and real-time project training
experience.description: NullClass Pvt. Ltd. Offers hands‑on learning through real-life projects. They provide 24/7 mentor support via platforms like WhatsApp to help learners build and operate real-time applications — aiming to bridge the gap between academic knowledge and industry‑ready skills

As part of Upflairs Pvt. Ltd., I play a key role in developing and managing projects related to Computer Science and Engineering courses. Serving as a Full Stack Web Development, craft intuitive interfaces, manage project timelines, and present our work at national IT festivals, showcasing our team's accomplishments and fostering industry collaboration.

Represented Rajasthan Technical University, Kota in Kabaddi for the year 2023-24 season as a player and participated in West Zone All India Inter University Kabaddi Tournament held at D.A.V Indore and Secured 12th position in the tournament.
